notifications.errorCreatingSpace: An error occurred while creating the $t(common.space).

visibility.title: Zichtbaarheid
visibility.public: Public: This $t(common.space) and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a $t(common.member).
visibility.private: Private: This $t(common.space) is visible to everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible to $t(common.members). Please note that both the information in the $t(common.profile) and the context are publicly visible.
visibility.publicSubspace: Public: This $t(common.subspace) and all its contents are visible to everyone who has access to the $t(common.space) it belongs to. If the $t(common.space) itself is public, this $t(common.subspace) and its contents will be visible to all users, including those outside the $t(common.space).
visibility.privateSubspace: Private: This $t(common.subspace) is visible to all $t(common.members) of the $t(common.space), but its contents are restricted and can only be accessed by $t(common.members) of the $t(common.subspace). No application required: All $t(common.space) $t(common.members) can directly join, without you having to review their application.

membership.title: $t(common.Membership)
membership.open: No Application required: All $t(common.space) $t(common.members) can directly join, without you having to review their application.
membership.applications: Application required: If people want to become a $t(common.member), they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see $t(common.community) tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitations: Invitation only: Users can only become a $t(common.member) after you’ve invited them (which you can do from the $t(common.community) tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host $t(common.organization): Allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembers: $t(common.space) invitations: Allow $t(common.admins) of $t(common.subspaces) to invite users to their $t(common.subspace). Users who were not yet a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.space), will become so when they accept the $t(common.subspace) invitation.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembersSubspa: $t(common.space) invitations: Allow $t(common.admins) of $t(common.subspaces) within this $t(common.subspace) to invite users directly to their own $t(common.subspace). If a user is not yet a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.subspace), they will automatically become one upon accepting the invitation. Note: Only users who are already $t(common.members) of the $t(common.space) can be invited this way.

memberActions.title: Toegestane acties voor leden
memberActions.createBlocks: Create $t(common.posts): Allow $t(common.members) to create $t(common.posts) for collaboration tools & $t(common.posts). If you deactivate this, $t(common.members) will still be able to contribute to existing $t(common.posts) and calls, but will not be able to create new $t(common.posts).
memberActions.createSubspaces: Create $t(common.subspaces): Allow $t(common.members) to create $t(common.subspaces) in this $t(common.space). If you deactivate this, you can still create $t(common.subspaces) yourself and add other people as an $t(common.admin) inside the $t(common.subspace).
memberActions.eventsFromSubspaces: $t(common.subspace) events: Allow events from $t(common.subspaces) to be visible on this $t(common.space) calendar as well.
memberActions.inheritRights: Allow $t(common.members) of the parent $t(common.community) to contribute without needing to join first.
memberActions.supportAsAdmin: Alkemio Support: Allow the Alkemio Support team to act as an $t(common.admin) in this $t(common.space).

copySpace.title: Copy $t(common.subspace)
copySpace.description: To utilize this $t(common.subspace) setup, you can either duplicate it within the same $t(common.space) or save it as a $t(common.template) for use across the platform. In both scenarios, the $t(common.innovation-flow) and all collaboration tools will be replicated. Please note that $t(common.comments) or contributions to a tool will not be included in the template or duplicated $t(common.subspace).
copySpace.createTemplateTooltip: To create a $t(common.template) from this $t(common.subspace), you need $t(common.space) $t(common.admin) permissions.

exploreSpaces.title: Explore $t(common.spaces) of Your Interest
exploreSpaces.subtitle: All activity on Alkemio happens inside $t(common.spaces) and their corresponding $t(common.subspaces). Explore both to find topics where you can contribute!
exploreSpaces.caption:
Discover a diverse range of $t(common.spaces) awaiting your exploration. Whether you're an experienced $t(common.member) or a curious newcomer, there's something here for everyone. Let's delve into the details:
  1. $t(common.member) $t(common.spaces): These are $t(common.spaces) where you already hold $t(common.membership).
  2. Public $t(common.spaces): These $t(common.spaces) have visible content, and you can request to join them.
  3. All $t(common.spaces): This category includes both public and private $t(common.spaces). In private $t(common.spaces), only limited content is visible, but you can still apply for $t(common.membership).
exploreSpaces.noSpaceMemberships: You’re not currently a $t(common.member) of any $t(common.space). Click here to visit our {{welcomeSpace}}, which is a fantastic starting point for your $t(common.space) on Alkemio!

search.noResults: Er zijn geen resultaten voor je zoekopdracht.

myLatestContributions.title: Mijn meest recente activiteit
myLatestContributions.noContributions: Your contributions will appear here once you participate in a $t(common.space). You can contribute by posting, commenting, or doing other activities.

vcCampaign.clickHere: Click below to create your $t(common.virtualContributors)—up to three available. The ones you created can be found under My $t(common.Account), along with the $t(common.space) where you can interact with them. Enjoy!

myMemberships.seeMore: That's all! Looking for other $t(common.spaces) to collaborate in? <spaces>Click here</spaces> to explore all $t(common.spaces) on the platform, or <landing>click here</landing> to create your own!

whiteboardDisconnected.title: $t(common.Whiteboards) connection lost
whiteboardDisconnected.message: Apologies for the inconvenience! The $t(common.whiteboard) isn't available for editing right now, possibly due to a network issue or loss of access. Please try closing and reopening the $t(common.whiteboard) or refreshing the page. If the issue persists, reach out to your $t(common.space) $t(common.admin) for assistance.
whiteboardDisconnected.lastSaved: The content of this $t(common.whiteboard) was last saved {{lastSaved}}.
whiteboardDisconnected.offline: You are currently offline. The $t(common.whiteboard) will try to reconnect when you are back online.

readonlyReason.contentUpdatePolicy: You don't have the rights to edit this $t(common.whiteboard). Ask the owner, <ownerlink>{{ownerName}}</ownerlink>, to change the Share $t(common.settings) if you want to contribute.
readonlyReason.noMembership: You have to be a $t(common.member) of the {{spaceLevel}} this $t(common.whiteboard) is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <spacelink>join/apply</spacelink>
readonlyReason.unauthenticated: You have to be signed in and a $t(common.member) of the {{spaceLevel}} this $t(common.whiteboard) is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <signinlink>sign in</signinlink>

reason.inactivity: You can’t edit this $t(common.whiteboard) because you were inactive for too long. Please try reopening the $t(common.whiteboard) to continue editing.
reason.multiUserNotAllowed: You can’t edit this $t(common.whiteboard) because this $t(common.space) only allows one $t(common.whiteboard) editor at a time
reason.roomCapacityReached: You can’t edit this $t(common.whiteboard) because this $t(common.space) allows for multiple editors simultaneously, but the maximum is reached
reason.generic:
You can’t edit this $t(common.whiteboard) for one of the following reasons:

- You were inactive for 2 hours or more
- You are not a $t(common.member) of the $t(common.space)
- This $t(common.space) only allows one $t(common.whiteboard) editor at a time
- This $t(common.space) allows for more editors, but the maximum is reached

readonlyReason.contentUpdatePolicy: You don't have the rights to edit this $t(common.memo). Ask the owner, <ownerlink>{{ownerName}}</ownerlink>, to change the Share $t(common.settings) if you want to contribute.
readonlyReason.noMembership: You have to be a $t(common.member) of the {{spaceLevel}} this $t(common.memo) is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <spacelink>join/apply</spacelink>
readonlyReason.unauthenticated: You have to be signed in and a $t(common.member) of the {{spaceLevel}} this $t(common.memo) is in, to be able to edit. Click here to <signinlink>sign in</signinlink>
readonlyReason.notSynced: Synchronizing... Reopen the $t(common.memo) to quickly enable it back. Backup your changes before closing.

reason.noUpdateAccess: You can’t edit this $t(common.memo) because you don’t have the rights to do so. Ask the owner, <ownerlink>{{ownerName}}</ownerlink>, to change the Share $t(common.settings) if you want to contribute.
reason.multiUserNotAllowed: You can’t edit this $t(common.memo) because this $t(common.space) only allows one $t(common.memo) editor at a time
reason.roomCapacityReached: You can’t edit this $t(common.memo) because this $t(common.space) allows for multiple editors simultaneously, but the maximum is reached
reason.generic:
You can’t edit this $t(common.memo) for one of the following reasons:

You are not a $t(common.member) of the $t(common.space)
- This $t(common.space) only allows one $t(common.memo) editor at a time
- This $t(common.space) allows for more editors, but the maximum is reached

about.title: Samenwerking hervormen
about.description: Alkemio puts the $t(common.subspaces) central, each $t(common.subspace) providing a central, neutral place for collaboration.

error.title: Oooeps!
error.line1: Het lijkt erop dat iets fout is gegaan: <italic>{{message}}</italic>
error.line2: Controleer of uw server ({{graphQLEndpoint}}) beschikbaar is en herlaad de pagina.
error.line3: Als de fout terug blijft komen, <contact>neem dan contact op met support</contact>.

errors.LazyLoadError: Netwerkfout opgetreden. Probeer de pagina opnieuw te laden.
errors.unknown: Er is een onbekende fout opgetreden. Probeer de pagina opnieuw te laden.

four-ou-four.title: Er is iets fout gegaan...
four-ou-four.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for either doesn't exist or has been moved, or you don't have the rights to access it. This may happen because you aren't a $t(common.member) of the $t(common.community) yet or are not signed in. Don't worry, our team is there to help!

links.faq: Neem een kijkje in onze FAQ en documentatie om te vinden wat je zoekt, of neem contact op met het team.

registration.header: Create an $t(common.account) to start using Alkemio
registration.introduction:
Welcome to Alkemio! Safe $t(common.spaces) for collaboration, education and professionals.

Alkemio is designed to benefit society. Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue.
registration.introduction-short: Alkemio is ontworpen ten goede van de samenleving. Lees en accepteer de gebruiksvoorwaarden en Privacybeleid voordat u verder gaat.

accept-terms.introduction:
Alkemio makes it easy to manage $t(common.subspaces) and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. $t(common.subspaces) take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.
accept-terms.tooltip: Lees en accepteer de Gebruiksvoorwaarden en het Privacybeleid voordat u doorgaat

registrationSuccess.message:
De laatste stap is het verifiëren van je e-mailadres. Controleer je inbox voor een e-mail met instructies.

Als je geen e-mail hebt ontvangen, klik dan hier om hem opnieuw te verzenden.
registrationSuccess.continue: …of ga door naar het platform zonder in te loggen

verification-success.header: Bedankt voor het verifiëren van uw email!
verification-success.subheader: Your $t(common.profile) is now fully activated on the platform. Enjoy!
verification-success.message: Please do consider filling out all $t(common.posts) of your $t(common.profile). It helps with both applying to join communities and with others being able to connect with you.

message.initial: Please enter your email address below to receive a recovery link that will allow you to reset your password.

verification.message: Vul hieronder je e-mailadres in om een nieuwe verificatielink te ontvangen.

verification-required.message:
Je bent er bijna... De laatste stap is het verifiëren van je e-mailadres.
Controleer je inbox voor een e-mail met instructies.

Als je geen e-mail hebt ontvangen, klik dan op deze link om opnieuw te verzenden.

confirmation-dialog.title: Space verlaten {{space}}
confirmation-dialog.text:
Are you sure you want to leave {{space}}?

You will no longer receive updates or have access to shared resources from this $t(common.space) or its $t(common.subspaces). If this $t(common.space) is public, you an rejoin at any time, or if private, you will need an invitation to rejoin.

Note that if you're a $t(common.member) of a $t(common.subspace) inside this $t(common.space), you will also be automatically removed from there.

confirmation-dialog.title: Leaving $t(common.subspace) {{space}}
confirmation-dialog.text:
Are you sure you want to leave {{space}}?

You will no longer receive updates or have access to shared resources from this $t(common.subspace) or its $t(common.subspaces). If this $t(common.subspace) is public, you an rejoin at any time, or if private, you will need an invitation to rejoin.

Note that if you're a $t(common.member) of a $t(common.subspace) inside this $t(common.subspace), you will also be automatically removed from there.

communities.title: Communities
communities.help: Communities waarvan de gebruiker lid is
communities.noMembership: Not a $t(common.member) of any $t(common.space) or $t(common.subspace) yet.

associated-organizations.title: Associated $t(common.organizations)
associated-organizations.help: $t(common.Organizations) who the user is related to

verifiable-credentials.title: Controleerbare Identiteitsverificatie
verifiable-credentials.help: Identiteitsverificatie die de gebruiker houdt, uitgegeven door vetrouwde partijen

virtualContributorProfile.title: $t(common.virtualContributor) $t(common.Profile)
virtualContributorProfile.bokIngestStarted: Bijwerken van kennisbank gestart. Het kan een paar minuten duren om te voltooien.

knowledge.title: Kennis
knowledge.description: De antwoorden die {{name}} geeft zijn gebaseerd op de kennisbank uit:

personality.title: Basis Prompts & Machine
personality.description: To allow people to interact with the body of knowledge described above, Alkemio uses an engine and a basic set of instructions. These instructions make sure that the $t(common.virtualContributor) for example only answers questions using the specified body of knowledge so you can trust the answers it is giving.

context.title: Context
context.description: {{name}} uses the following information from the $t(common.space) it is invited to so it can provide you with meaningful answers:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Voor Alkemio is het beschermen van je gegevens van het allergrootste belang. We zijn vastbesloten om de veiligheid en privacy van je informatie te waarborgen.
privacy.bullets:
• When interacting with a $t(common.virtualContributor), only the data explicitly specified on the left (Context) is used to generate meaningful answers.
  • Importantly, your ($t(common.space)) data is not utilized for training the $t(common.virtualContributor).
  • Additionally, please note that questions and answers exchanged with the $t(common.virtualContributor) may be visible to the Alkemio team.

personality.description: This $t(common.virtualContributor) operates using the following external AI service: Mistral. All questions submitted to this $t(common.virtualContributor), along with any related $t(common.comments) in a threaded conversation, will be sent to Mistral. Please be aware that this data may be used to train and improve their model.

privacy.description: At Alkemio, protecting your data is our top priority. We are fully committed to ensuring the security and privacy of your information. Here’s how we handle your data when interacting with a $t(common.virtualContributor) (VC):
privacy.bullets:
• Only the content of your question and any related $t(common.comments) in a threaded conversation are shared with the AI service that powers the $t(common.virtualContributor).
  • Please be aware that if the $t(common.virtualContributor) is based on an external AI service, such as Mistral, the data shared may be used to further train and improve that service.
  • Additionally, note that questions and answers exchanged with the $t(common.virtualContributor) may be accessible to the Alkemio team for monitoring or support purposes.

membership.title: $t(common.virtualContributor) $t(common.Memberships)
membership.noMemberships: This $t(common.virtualContributor) is not a $t(common.member) of any $t(common.space)

visibility.public: Public: This $t(common.virtualContributor) can be invited to all $t(common.spaces) on Alkemio
visibility.private: Private: This $t(common.virtualContributor) can be invited to $t(common.spaces) within my $t(common.account).

ingestion.title: Werk kennis bij
ingestion.infoText: Changes in the body of knowledge are not autmatically reflected in the $t(common.virtualContributor). You need to manually apply them by clicking the button <bold>'UPDATE KNOWLEDGE'</bold>. It will take a few minutes for the update to complete. You can check back later to see if the update was successful.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.infoText: Available variables: [{{availableVariables}}] . Do not include any alternative text between { } in the prompt, as this will disrupt the functionality of this $t(common.virtualContributor).

externalConfig.title: Externe configuratie
externalConfig.infoText: The $t(common.virtualContributor) is powered by an external AI service. Please provide the following information to connect to the service.
externalConfig.apiKeyPlaceholder: Huidige sleutelhandtekening is '{{value}}'. Door deze waarde te wijzigen wordt de huidige sleutel overschreven en kan niet worden hersteld.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.tooltip1: Public: When users visit {{vcName}}'s $t(common.profile), they can see the content of its body of knowledge.
privacy.tooltip2: Private: Only the $t(common.account) $t(common.admins) can see the content of the body of knowledge.

noAccess.title: Private $t(common.virtualContributor) Knowledge
noAccess.description: You don't have access to the knowledge base of this $t(common.virtualContributor). Please contact the owner of the $t(common.virtualContributor) for more information.

your-credentials.title: Mijn Controleerbare Identiteitsverificatie
your-credentials.description: Alkemio cachet je controleerbare identiteitsverificatie in jouw cloud-hosted wallet. De identiteitsverificaties die je deelt kunnen je privileges in communities op het platform geven.

authentication-required.subheader: De pagina die je probeert te openen, is alleen beschikbaar voor geregistreerde gebruikers.
authentication-required.subheader2: Please sign in to continue. Don’t have an $t(common.account)? Sign up for free.

general.title: Algemeen
general.subtitle: Hier kun je jouw voorkeur aangeven met betrekking tot het ontvangen van berichten

space.title: $t(common.space) $t(common.settings)
space.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding receiving messages from $t(common.spaces) you are a $t(common.member) of

settings.communicationUpdateSent: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new update is shared with a $t(common.community) I am a $t(common.member) of
settings.collaborationCalloutPublished: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a Callout is published in a $t(common.community) I am a $t(common.member) of
settings.collaborationCalloutContributionCreated: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new contribution ($t(common.whiteboard), $t(common.post), link, $t(common.memo) etc.) is created in a $t(common.community) I am a $t(common.member) of
settings.collaborationCalloutComment: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a a $t(common.comment) is made on a Callout in a $t(common.community) I am a $t(common.member) of
settings.collaborationCalloutPostContributionComm: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new $t(common.comment) is added to a $t(common.post) contribution in a $t(common.community) I am a $t(common.member) of

spaceAdmin.title: $t(common.space) $t(common.admin) $t(common.settings)
spaceAdmin.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding receiving messages from $t(common.spaces) you are an $t(common.admin) of

settings.communityApplicationReceived: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new application is received
settings.communityNewMember: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new $t(common.member) joins the $t(common.community)
settings.collaborationCalloutContributionCreated: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new callout is created
settings.communicationMessageReceived: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new message is received

organization.title: $t(common.Organization) mentions and messaging
organization.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding mentions and direct messaging to $t(common.organizations) you manage

settings.mentioned: Receive a $t(common.notification) when my $t(common.organization) is mentioned

user.title: User mentions and messaging
user.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding mentions and direct messaging to yourself.

settings.mentioned: Receive a $t(common.notification) when I am mentioned
settings.commentReply: Receive a $t(common.notification) when someone replies to my $t(common.comment)
settings.messageReceived: Receive a $t(common.notification) when someone sends me a direct message
settings.copyOfMessageSent: Receive a $t(common.notification) when I send a direct message

userMembership.title: User $t(common.membership) $t(common.notifications)
userMembership.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding $t(common.notifications) related to your $t(common.membership) in communities.

settings.spaceCommunityApplication: Receive a $t(common.notification) when I apply to join a $t(common.community)
settings.spaceCommunityInvitation: Receive a $t(common.notification) when someone invites you to join a $t(common.community)
settings.spaceCommunityJoined: Receive a $t(common.notification) when I join a new $t(common.space) $t(common.community)

platformAdmin.title: Platform $t(common.admin) $t(common.settings)
platformAdmin.subtitle: This section is only visible to users that are a global $t(common.admin) on the platform

settings.adminUserProfileCreated: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new user signs up
settings.adminUserProfileRemoved: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a user $t(common.profile) is removed
settings.adminSpaceCreated: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new $t(common.space) is created
settings.adminUserGlobalRoleChanged: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a user's global role is changed

forum.title: $t(common.forum)
forum.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding activities in the $t(common.forum)

settings.forumDiscussionComment: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new $t(common.comment) is added to a discussion I follow
settings.forumDiscussionCreated: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a new discussion is created

virtualContributor.title: $t(common.virtualContributor)
virtualContributor.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding activities as a $t(common.virtualContributor)

settings.spaceCommunityInvitation: Receive a $t(common.notification) when a VC I manage is invited to join a $t(common.community)

help-dialog.title: Op zoek naar hulp?
help-dialog.text:
Wij willen je graag helpen met het werken op het Alkemio platform door het gebruik en de interactie makkelijker maken. Zo kun jij succesvol impact maken en bijdragen aan de Challenges waar je om geeft.

Klik op de onderstaande icons om antwoorden op je vragen te vinden, contact op te nemen met het Alkemio team voor ondersteuning, of ga meteen aan de slag!
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Op zoek naar tips & tricks? Vind ze hier in onze blogs!

forum.title: Welcome to the Alkemio $t(common.forum)
forum.subtitle: Neem contact op met het Alkemio team of andere gebruikers van het platform!
